Posting bills online for 72 hours before consideration would give lawmakers and citizens alike an opportunity to consider and debate bills with full knowledge and consideration of the implications of the legislation with considered feedback from the public.
Encouraging the 111th Congress to share legislation online and wait at least 72 hours before bringing any legislation to consideration
This is the alert box.  Messages might go here.  It isn't always displayed.  It can be turned off.  I'm not sure what the original idea for it was.
